Description: Body sherd of Chian Mature Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior: glazed streaky black; part of rosette in added white outline above two white bands; exterior: painted decoration consisting of lion (part of head and mane remaining) to right; dotted square as filling ornament.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0564) (phase 2)
